name: Harini Sivanandh
title: Classical Dance Student & Enthusiast
bio: Harini is a passionate student of classical Indian dance forms, specializing in Bharatanatyam under the guidance of Guru Smt. Vishal Ramani. With over 10 years of dedicated learning, she focuses on mastering the traditional techniques, expressions, and cultural significance of this ancient art form.

performances.title: Ananda Margam - First Major Performance
performances.description: Complete Bharatanatyam repertoire performance including Alarippu, Jatiswaram, Shabdam, Varnam, and Padam
performances.venue: Under guidance of Guru Smt. Vishal Ramani

testimonials.name: Guru Smt. Vishal Ramani
testimonials.quote: Harini's dedication to learning Bharatanatyam is remarkable. Her performances show genuine passion and respect for the classical art form.

projects.title: Sankara Eye Hospital Internship
projects.description: High school internship at super-speciality Sankara Eye Hospital, Coimbatore, India
projects.impact: Gained practical healthcare knowledge, learned about compassion and service, and witnessed the power of philanthropic healthcare

awards.title: Ananda Margam - First Major Performance
awards.description: Successfully completed my first major Bharatanatyam performance - a complete dance repertoire showcasing fundamental techniques, expressions, and storytelling
awards.significance: Major milestone in classical dance learning journey, marking transition from student to performer
awards.venue: Under guidance of Guru Smt. Vishal Ramani
